>Construction of pLYC3
acquire oligo olyc3				
acquire oligo olyc1
acquire oligo olyc1r
acquire oligo olyc3r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc3,olyc1r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA3)
PCR olyc1,olyc3r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB3)
Assemble pcrA3,pcrB3	(Gibson, pLYC3)
Transform pLYC3	(Mach1, Amp)
